title: Held to Randsom
description: This is a love story – all about finding the One and the mistakes you make along the waySydney McKinney is 23, beautiful, single and still living at home with her parents, going from one crap job to another, finally she lands her dream job, she leaves her family and best friend and moves to London – it’s time to live her life. Suddenly life goes full speed as she finally finds love.Jude Montgomery is the gorgeous lead singer with one of the biggest bands in the country, although he has everything he desires, money, cars, women, he is missing the one thing that would make him truly complete...Then he sees her across the room. She is everything he has been dreaming of, when their eyes meet he knows she’s the one for him – he just needs her to feel the same way ……
author: Jayme L. Townsend
